page.title: 07News coverage in Annan
page.content: There are three main ways of finding out about what is happenning around Annan. 1. Local{Newspapers}: The Annandale Observer is a weekly paper, published and printed in Annan and circulating in the Annandale, Eskdale and Border country. The Dumfries and Galloway Standard covers a similar area plus Dumfries and publishes twice a week. 2. Local{Radio}: Radio Solway broadcasts twice a day from Dumfries. Each broadcast lasts about 30 minutes. It is part of the British Broadcasting Corporation. 3. Local{Television}: Border TV is an Independent TV station brodcasting from Carlisle and covering the northwest of England and the south of Scotland. They broadcast about 30 minutes of local news a day.
